HEADER.LANGUAGE_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: We do not yet support that language but are actively working on translations.

MARKETING_HEADER.1: A revolution is coming to travel
MARKETING_HEADER.2: A de-centralized payment gateway made specifically for airlines, hotels, car rental, cruise ships, rail, online travel agencies, booking engines and channel managers.
MARKETING_HEADER.3: Our blockchain platform is fast, smart, secure, eco-friendly and built for the travel industry.

NUTSHELL.PAYMENT_GATEWAY_DESC: A robust, secure, scalable and super fast payment gateway on the blockchain for travel suppliers to transact with one another at no cost.
NUTSHELL.LOYALTY_PLATFORM_DESC: Our Travelkoin token is a global white labeled loyalty program that travel partners can use for their membership programs at no cost.
NUTSHELL.STABLE_SETTLEMENTS_DESC: Our Standard Travel Unit token is pegged to a basket of currencies which are most commonly used in the travel industry.
NUTSHELL.MATURE_TEAM_DESC: Our team all work for online travel companies within tech, sales, operations and marketing. We know the technology and its pain points.
NUTSHELL.TOKEN_VALUE_DESC: Ethereum for travel. Our loyalty token functions as gas. Travelers generate them and suppliers need it to power the platform.
NUTSHELL.VETERAN_ADVISORS_DESC: Our team of advisors have decades of experience in both travel and the blockchain. Get to know them below.

ICO.DURATION_DESC: This event starts at 12:00:00 UTC on April 9th, 2018 and runs for 5 days only.
ICO.BONUSES_DESC: No pre-sale, extra sale or whale bonuses.
ICO.LIMIT_DESC: Limit 1 ETH investment during the first 24 hours. No limits after the 24 hours.
ICO.CAPS_DESC: Both soft and hard cap are realistic for what we want to accomplish.
ICO.HODLR_DESC: We welcome you and hope you like our reward structure.

PAYMENT_GATEWAY.DESCRIPTION: Travel suppliers can do intelligent cross-border payments using smart contracts within the eco-system fast, secure and at no cost. Forget about middle men, transaction fees and waiting days to receive your money.

LOYALTY_PLATFORM.DESCRIPTION: A Travelkoin powered membership platform all travel suppliers can get behind without having to maintain their own. Travelers are compensated for bookings, reviews etc in services within the travel supplier network or by converting to fiat currency.

WAITING_FOR.1: Create an account with us and get ready for something BIG to happen in travel.

FEATURES.PAYMENT_GATEWAY_1: Travel suppliers are particularly prone to having to pay excessive transaction fees because their industry is particularly fragmented and, more often than not, require multiple cross-border transactions. It also means payments often take time to process and travel suppliers have to guarantee payments up to 45 days in advance. The only way to currently make transaction fees go down is to process more transactions and receive a bulk discount from the payment provider.
FEATURES.PAYMENT_GATEWAY_2: puts an end to the complexity and cost of doing business in the travel eco-system. Payments are immediate and suppliers can deal directly with their counter-party without the need for a costly middle man. This is made possible by the blockchain and our custom made smart contracts for travel suppliers. Watch the video about blockchain made by Sloan's School of business at MIT.
FEATURES.LOYALTY_PLATFORM_1: Almost everyone in the travel industry use a membership rewards program to acquire and retain customers. Customers are locked into programs that offer little or no incentive to stay except for being penalized if they don't keep on racking up points. A loyalty program should be mutually beneficial and fun!
FEATURES.LOYALTY_PLATFORM_2: offers a loyalty platform quite like no other. It works as well for B2C as it does for B2B. The benefits to its users are many: It can be converted to fiat currency at any time. If you have earned Travelkoin tokens, they never expire. Travelkoins are only generated when a travel related action occurs, such as a booking. A travel supplier wants these tokens from their customers so they can use them to get free services on the Travelkoin Platform. That way travel suppliers will be competing between themselves to acquire customers and customer satisfaction goes through the roof. Finally, the token can easily be white labelled allowing larger suppliers with existing programs to easily switch.
FEATURES.STABLE_SETTLEMENTS_1: Stability is the most important feature of global economies to be successful. Without stability, individuals across the world could not have foreseeable costs while engaging in commerce and savings allowing them to make reasonable decisions. And with this stability and predictability and fungibility in mind, Travelkoinâ€™s STU was designed: as an attempt to bring stability and better business planning to the world of crypto currency and to the world of travel and to all individuals who use the Travelkoin network.
FEATURES.STABLE_SETTLEMENTS_2: STUs are created by a mechanism similar to convertible notes, which are often used to fund start-ups. In the startup scene, convertible notes are short-term debt instruments that can be converted to ownership at a rate determined in the future, typically during future funding rounds. A blockchain based token, like Travelkoin, can be considered as ownership in the community whereas a convertible note, like STU, can be viewed as a debt denominated in any other commodity or currency. The terms of the convertible note allow the holder to convert to the backing value with a minimum notice at the fair market price.

STEP1.DESCRIPTION: Traveliko.com, a Singapore based online travel agency, rewards travelers with Travelkoin tokens as its loyalty point platform.

STEP2.DESCRIPTION: The Blockchain Company launches. A joint venture by online and brick and mortar travel companies.

STEP3.DESCRIPTION: The Travelkoin pre-sale will last the month of March.

STEP5.DESCRIPTION: Traveliko.com will be completely integrated with the Travelkoin Loyalty Platform.

STEP6.DESCRIPTION: The Travelkoin Loyalty Platform will be generally available for travel suppliers to integrate with.

STEP7.DESCRIPTION: Traveliko.com will be the first to use our payment gateway to make and receive payments.

LOGIN.ACCOUNT_VERIFIED: Your account has been verified. Please log in.
LOGIN.WAITING_ON_VERIFICATION: Please verify your email to activate your account. Check your inbox.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY: Your password has been reset. Please log in.
LOGIN.MEMBERS_AREA_INFO: Use the form below to login to your account.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.INFO: Use the form below to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.EXPECTATION: You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.ERROR: There was an error with your reset request.

RESEND_EMAIL.TITLE: Resend welcome email
RESEND_EMAIL.INFO: Use the form below to re-send your welcome email.
RESEND_EMAIL.EXPECTATION: If you did not receive your welcome email or in case your verification code is out dated, type in your email to receive a new email containing a code you can use to verify your account.

REGISTER.TITLE: Create your account
REGISTER.PASSWORD_SYNTAX: The password must be at least 8 characters; contain a lower case and an uppercase character, a number and a symbol.

VERIFY_EMAIL.TITLE: Verify your email
VERIFY_EMAIL.INFO: Use the form below to enter the verification code that was sent to you via email.
VERIFY_EMAIL.VERIFICATION_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: Enter code your received via email...

PHONE_VERIFIER.TITLE: Phone verification
PHONE_VERIFIER.ENTER_CODE: Enter the code you received via SMS
PHONE_VERIFIER.ENTER_CODE_HELP: Enter the number like this: +12125551212 (Country code and phone number. No spaces.). Standard SMS charges may apply.

DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Travelkoin. This will be your interface to our ICO event.
DASHBOARD.WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL: Your account is under review. We will notify you once your application has been approved.

WALLET.TITLE: Wallet
WALLET.TRANSACTION_MISMATCH: This transaction doesn't match your address and will be ignored.
WALLET.DESCRIPTION: This section allows you to tell us about the payments you sent from your {{type}} wallet for the event.

VALUE.INSTRUCTIONS: Start by clicking the plus button to buy Travelkoin tokens.

SEND.DESCRIPTION: After you've made a payment from your wallet to ours, fill in this form to let us know. You do not need to notify us via email. When the ICO starts, you will be able to execute the contract that converts your funds to Travelkoin.
SEND.AMOUNT_HELP: Enter the amount you sent to us for the transaction ID
SEND.WALLET_TRANSACTION_HELP: Enter the transaction identifier for the funds you transferred.
SEND.WALLET_SENDER_HELP: Optional: Enter the address of the wallet you sent the funds from.
SEND.WALLET_RECIPIENT_HELP: This is the address you will use to transfer funds to us for the event.

EXCHANGE.DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: You are about to exchange {{amount}} {{type}} to TKT. Continue?
EXCHANGE.AMOUNT_HELP: How much do you want to convert to Travelkoin (TKT)?

SUCCESS_BOX.RECORD_SUCCESS: Your account details have been submitted. You will receive an email once your account has been approved.

FAILURE_BOX.RECORD_FAILURE: Something went wrong. Please try again.

FORMS.DESCRIPTION: Please fill in the required form fields below and upload the documents we require of you. Once approved, you will be allowed to transfer ETH to our wallet.
FORMS.DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: You're all set to submit your documents. Are you ready?
FORMS.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_HELP_1: A scanned copy or a high definition photo of your passport. Use of color scanner is preferred.
FORMS.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_HELP_2: A utility bill, no more than 3 months old, confirming your address.
FORMS.DOCUMENTS_REQUIRED: All documents are required before we can approve your account.
FORMS.ETH_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter the Ethereum address you will use to transfer funds to us. You will only be able to use this one. Other transactions will be ignored.
FORMS.BTC_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter the Bitcoin address you will use to transfer funds to us. You will only be able to use this one. Other transactions will be ignored.
